# Next.js Marketing Website Project

This is a marketing website built with Next.js App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

## Stack

- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui (light theme only)
- ESLint + Prettier

## Project Structure

- `app/(marketing)/` - Marketing pages group
- `app/blog/` - Blog pages
- `components/` - Reusable React components
- `lib/` - Utility functions
- `scripts/` - Build and automation scripts (including future Playwright parser)

## Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow App Router patterns
- Use Tailwind for styling
- Import shadcn/ui components from `@/components/ui`
- Light theme only (no dark mode)
- Keep components small and focused
- Use ESLint and Prettier for code quality
